Description:
Melrose is a quiet and peaceful apartment community located in Triangle, North Virginia. The Quantico Marine Corps military base is situated near the community that further makes it a peaceful neighborhood for the residents. The community features various on-site amenities including a playground, laundry facility and 24 hours emergency maintenance. There is also a common on-site storage facility for all the residents.
The property is constructed at such a central position that it provides residents with easy access to places of their interest and need. The fact that the distance to interstate is just less than a mile, Virginia Rail Express is near to the community and there is a bus route available nearby, makes Melrose a perfectly accessible area for all its residents. There are many restaurants (Applebee’s, Dunkin Donuts), shopping centers (Potomac Mills) and schools available at a close distance to the property which is a great benefit for anyone residing in Melrose.
Apartments at Melrose feature high-speed internet access, ready access to cable / satellite, pet-friendly environment (cats and dogs only) and newly upgraded kitchens. Each apartment provides wall-to-wall carpeting and walk-in closets, however, washer / dryer hook-ups are available only in selected apartments. Just like the outside environment, the apartments are made to look simple from inside and provide a peaceful and serene atmosphere for the residents. There is no community provided parking facility; however, residents can comfortably park their vehicles across the road.
